# deps/skia/src/xml

set(SKIA_XML_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/xml")
# set(SKIA_XML_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/xml")

file(GLOB SKIA_XML_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_XML_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_XML_SOURCES "${SKIA_XML_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_XML_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_XML_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_XML_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_XML_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_XML_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
